author: Open
title: ISB&M
text:
From being legacy of High value preposition for placement, Learning and career since 25 years, to being consistent with 2nd rank in Pune, 4th in West zone and 12th in Top 100 B-Schools in India, ISB&M has got it all to be the perfect choice for every aspirer in India.
GUIDED BY ONE OF THE BEST
The Dr Pramod Kumar, President (Ph.D. (OB), IIT Bombay, formerly with IIM Ahmedabad, XLRI, SIBM Pune). 50+ full time faculty with the PhDs, MBAs / M.tech and work experience from IIM-A,IIM-C, IIML, Kozhikode, XLRI,IIT Mumbai, IIT Kanpur, IIT Kharagpur, NITs, TISS, University of Paris, Saclay- France, University of Texas Austin and 150+ industry experts are the supreme reasons behind this mile stone of being one of the best.
DR. PRAMOD KUMAR, President, ISB&M
FUTURE FORWARD
Offering full time dual specialization PGDM Program for fresher’s and working professionals from diverse city and state of the country to drive your fast track career with the highly advanced specializations in Marketing, Logistic & Supply chain Management, Business analytics, Finance, HR, OB & Strategy, Media and Communication in 4 Campuses of Pune Nande & Mulshi, Kolkata and Bengaluru.
Career with the World’s Best Employee & Companies
ISB&M Alumni share 90 % in world’s (Across 36 Countries) best employers with companies like Google, Apple, Ernst & Young, Goldman Sachs, PwC, Deloitte, Microsoft, KPMG, L’Oréal, Amazon, Adidas, Procter & Gamble, BMW Group, Nike, Bain & Co, Mckinsey & Company, JP Morgan, Boston Consulting Group, Morgan Stanley, Coca –Cola, Unilever, all across the Globe in Leadership Role – Over 10000 + Alumni are working with top Indian & MNCs in senior positions like Director- HR, Sr. Vice President, Vice President, Director- Marketing across the world.
